name: stop-mess-around
description: 减少摸鱼的时间和频率的浏览器插件：提醒你正在摸鱼，摸鱼的时候知道自己在摸鱼，提高我们上班和学习的效率，节省时间用于学习提升自己或者享受生活

scripts.serve: node deploy.js development && vue-cli-service build-watch --mode serveReleaseChrome
scripts.build-plugin: node deploy.js production  && vue-cli-service build --mode productionChrome
scripts.build-release: node deploy.js development && vue-cli-service build --mode productionReleaseChrome
scripts.serve:fireFox: node deploy.js development fireFox && vue-cli-service build-watch --mode serveReleaseFireFOX
scripts.build-plugin:Edg: node deploy.js development && vue-cli-service build --mode productionEdge
scripts.build-release:Edg: node deploy.js production && vue-cli-service build --mode productionReleaseEdge
scripts.build-plugin:fireFox: node deploy.js production fireFox && vue-cli-service build --mode productionFireFox && npm run pack
scripts.build-release:fireFox: node deploy.js development fireFox && vue-cli-service build --mode productionReleaseFireFox
